div.div: D401 Schools Are Closed for Rest of 2019-20; Remote Learning Continues

h3.a: In-Person Instruction Suspended for Remainder of School Year

div.p: District 401 will continue with remote learning for the rest of 2019-20 following Gov. Pritzker's decision to keep schools closed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

h3.a: D401 Board of Education Approves Revised 2020-21 School Year Calendar

div.p: The start date for students is pushed back to Aug. 31, 2020, and the end date to June 9, 2021, but previously scheduled breaks and early release days are unchanged.

h3.a: April 15 Letter from Dr. Wade to the Board: Update on COVID-19 Impact

div.p: In a letter prepared for the District 401 Board of Education, Superintendent Dr. Nicolas Wade summarizes the impact of COVID-19 on current and future District operations.
